channel.title: docker on DazzLog
channel.description: Recent content in docker on DazzLog

item.title: Environment variables in a dockerized Symfony
item.description: I have developed a Symfony Web-Application and I run it locally in a dockerized environment with docker-compose. Now this app is going to be deployed to production as a docker container.

item.title: Build and push docker images to ghcr.io with GitHub Actions
item.description: When you host your project code on GitHub and want to release it as a docker image for deployment or just publish it, the way to go are GitHub actions. Itâ€™s basically hooks that can start CI/DC workflows on repository events.
